abstract.t: In this document is proposed a protocol for intra-domain mobilitymanagement. This is intended to offer a transparent point-to-pointtransport service for IP datagrams that need to be delivered tomobile nodes. SIMPLE (Scalable Intra-domain Mobility Protocol usingLocal Encapsulation) makes it possible for a mobile node to changeits point of attachment to a LAN, a group of LANs or even a MANwithout changing its IP address, this link being the home or aforeign one.
